author: USA TODAY, Dr. Randi Smith, Dr. Amy Zeidan and Dr. Jason Sciarretta, Opinion contributors
title: Doctors: Violent trauma will surge amid coronavirus upheaval. We're already seeing it.
description: Pandemics are widespread, deadly and destructive. Stress soars and all forms of violence are likely to increase. Stay home, but stay home safely.
content:
Pandemics are widespread, deadly and destructive. Stress soars and all forms of violence are likely to increase. Stay home, but stay home safely.
